game.name: Emblems: Sunless Vow
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Two lost souls are stripped of their memories and sent to a hostile purgatory- which has pulled in their captor as well! These unlikely friends must uncover the secrets of their past to escape...but can they stop *arguing* first? | A mystery VN with (quick) turn-based combat!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Two lost souls are stripped of their memories and sent to a hostile purgatory- which has pulled in their captor as well! These unlikely friends must uncover the secrets of their past to escape...but can they stop *arguing* first? | A mystery VN with (quick) turn-based combat!
